comments:
Starting with a clean workspace I created a new JPA project with an orm.xml file and received a NullPointerException.  This does not always occur when creating a new project in a clean workspace, but since it happens with some regularity I wanted to report it. 

The persistence.xml file is invalid and appears modified with the * by the editor.  Here is the persistence.xml file:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<persistence>
</persistence>

And the exception:

*** ERROR ***: Wed May 16 15:39:09 EDT 2007    java.lang.NullPointerException

Changing status to "WORKSFORME" for now.  I tried about 10 times without getting it to happen.  If we can get some better intel on when and where this happens, we'll certainly open it back up.
This is still reproduce-able although it seems the exception isn't always thrown.  This is normally seen in a clean workspace and happens only occasionally.
